content: this kids top is perfect for throwing over a swimsuit or a tank top and is sure to be well loved by any that wear it -approx 230 yards for 2/3t -approx 280 yards for 3/4t -approx 320 yards for 4/6 -approx 415 yards for 6/8 -approx 540 yards for 10/12 **gauge pattern ** row 1 chain-17 double_crochet in 5th chain from hook * chain-1 skip-1 chain double_crochet in next * repeat between * * to end 15 row 2 8 chain-4 turn double_crochet in first chain-space * chain-1 double_crochet in next chain-space * repeat between * * 5 more times 15 *measurement of 15 sts includes both double_crochet and chain stitches
